full_summary:
=================

**Notice of Intent**

The High Commission of Canada in India has issued a notice of intent to engage a contractor to provide Pest Control Services for its facilities in New Delhi. 

**Reference Number**

The reference number for this tender is: cb-178-40640642.

**Tender Details**

* **Title**: Pest Control Services for the High Commission of Canada (HCC) in India in New Delhi.
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: In accordance with the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and other relevant agreements.
* **Regions of Opportunity**: World
* **Regions of Delivery**: India
* **Contracting Entity**: Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada

**Notice Information**

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-06-03T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-10-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2026-09-30
* **Notice URL**: Not available
* **Contract Award Method**: Open bidding

**Service Description**

The High Commission of Canada requires a contractor to provide pest control services for its representational space, common areas, and workspace occupied by staff in its facilities in New Delhi. The contractor will be required to provide a range of pest control services, including mosquito control, rodent control, cockroach control, among others. The services will be performed in accordance with industry standards, maintaining and providing decent working conditions for the occupants of the buildings.

**Tender Documents**

The tender documents for this opportunity are available at [Link] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37454/22-211934-rfp-delhi---final_0.pdf).
